name: Build-a-Pup-3000
description:
Create a dog for the upcoming flying dog, flying whale, co-op, crew game, Flock of Dogs!

With the Build-A-Pup 3000, you can choose the breed, name, and colors of your pup, save a GIF, and share it with the world. Then if you have a Build-A-Pup key, you can copy your creation code, email Max with your key, and then it will be added into Flock of Dogs. Back the Kickstarter now to put your creation in the game!

Note: not yet feature complete! Plans include the following list.

  • More breeds
  • Different spot patterns for each dog
  • Saving the dog's name in the gif!
  • And more!
